summary: This is a completely modular animation replacer mod, pick and choose which ones you want to use through the installer. So far there is animations for Bow, Magic, 1 Handed, and Dual Wielding with more to come.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=4]UPDATE: Version 1.5 is up! 2hm idle (with turns), alternate run left/rights for magic and 1 handed, and adjustments to existing animations. I wasn't able to get the sneak animations working right for this release unfortunately. Check new video![/size][/color]

[youtube]iCJqpJ9Vsdo[/youtube] [youtube]6T01D_xCgvI[/youtube]

[b][color=yellow][size=4]All animations are optional through the installer, only install the ones you want use![/size][/color][/b]

Alternate Animations originally started out as me tweaking the bow animations because I was never happy with any of the current ones out there, they were decent animations just didn't feel right in my gameplay. After tweaking the those animations I ended up moving on to some others that I figured I might as well tweak, since I was already making adjustments. Before I knew it I had ended up with enough to make a mod with.

[color=yellow][size=4]What animations are Included:[/size][/color]
1. Bow - idle, runforward (all 3), strafe, and sprint (with separate female)
2. 1hm - idle, runforward (all 3), sprint, turn left/right, and strafe (neutral for use with both)
3. Magic - idle (left/right handed, dual), runforward (all 3), sprint, turn left/right, and strafe
4. Dual Wield - Idle, sprint

I'll be adding more animations to the pack as well as various options to the current ones as time permits.

[color=yellow][size=4]On the List (no particular order):[/size][/color]
1. Sneak animations
2. Backwards animations
3. Fixes to various clipping issues
4. Jump

[color=yellow][size=4]Change log[/size][/color]
02/20/14 (1.5)
---------------------
adjusted
- dual wield idle, positioning to better match turning animation for less twitching

added
- 2 Hand idle and turning with minimal clipping issues (inspired by the Nebenhut stance from ARMA)
- 1 handed strafing run left/right
- Magic strafing run left/right

12/15/13 (1.4)
---------------------
adjusted
- Magic left hand idle, better positioning and more nautral bend of the arm
- Magic turning animations, was able to resolve most of the twitching problem
- 1 Hand idle animation, shield up higher and sword further out to avoid clipping
- 1 Hand turning animations, to match new position of shield and sword arm

added
- Bow idle animation
- Bow runleft and runright alternate animations, non facing forward strafing

09/22/13 (1.3)
---------------------
adjusted
- Dual Wield Idle
- 1 handed turn right and left

09/10/13 (1.2)
---------------------
adjusted
- Magic and 1 handed run left and right. Fixed some clipping issues and problems with shield tilting weird.
- Magic left and right handed idle. Added animations to fingers and adjusted positions.

09/01/13 (1.1)
---------------------
adjusted
- Magic and 1 handed run left and right
- dual magic and 1 handed idle
- fixed shield positioning
- 1 handed sprint forward

added
- 1 handed run forward, forwardleft, forward right
- 1 handed turn left and right
- dual wield idle
- dual wield sprint

08/29/13 (1.0)
---------------------
Initial release

[color=yellow][size=4]Recommended Animation Mods:[/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34950//?] Immersive Animations [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29622//?] XP32 New Animation Package [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34508//?] 360 Walk and Run Plus [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17491//?] D13 Faster GET UP STAND UP [/url]

[color=yellow][size=4]Permissions:[/size][/color]
Just ask before you do anything, I generally don't have any issues if you ask.

[color=yellow][size=4]A Special Thanks:[/size][/color]
Bergzore, XP32, and aeonflux88 for the tutorials and willingness to help modders with animations.
author: bebauch
